CLUB EVENTS
IMG Academy Golf Club prides themselves on hosting an active event calendar during 'season'.  Something for everyone, the Club Events are open to Members and guests and range from Wine Pairing Dinners and Chef's Table nights to Tribute Concerts and more!
AUGUST CALENDAR
SUMMER UPDATES
MONTHLY CALENDAR
You can find current hours, events and specials for the current month by clicking the tile above.
Please call (941) 758-1467 for details and reservations.
UPCOMING EVENTS & SPECIALS
You can find upcoming club events and specials by clicking the tile above.
Please call (941) 758-1467 for details and reservations.

Play
HOST AN EVENT AT IMG ACADEMY GOLF CLUB
With picturesque views, immaculate grounds, and delectable food, IMG Academy Golf Club is an ideal setting for your event.  We are a full service venue that is commited to hospitality, quality, and truly personalized service.
We look forward to meeting you and helping you create a once in a lifetime experience for both you and your guests!
Weddings
Your perfect day by the Sarasota Bay.
Social Gatherings
Birthdays, Fundraising Galas & Luncheons, Golf Tournaments and more..!
Say Hello
Introduce yourself to our Banquet Team.

MEMBERSHIP INFORMATION
Something for everyone...
IMG Academy Golf Club has membership opportunites for every level of golfer. Whether you play 3-5 times a week, 1-2 times a week or are looking for a more dining focused membership... we have what you're looking for.
Excellent amenities, great golf course, delicious and high-quality food, gorgeous views.. what more could you want from your Florida home golf course?
Interested in signing up or learning more?
Contact Sydney Weber in our Membership department and she will be happy to assist you.
E-Mail:
[email protected]
2025 MEMBERSHIPS
MEMBERSHIP APPLICATION
Book Your Tee Time
We offer regularly scheduled men’s and ladies’ play, and thanks to our enthusiastic membership, the IMG Academy Golf Club enjoys one of the most active groups of golf associations in the area. 
The course provides a rewarding golf experience at every level. Impeccably maintained year-round, IMGA Academy Golf Club continuously attracts those who demand the finest playing conditions. We are proud to be the home course of the IMG Academy Golf program. 

Call to reserve your tee time: (941) 758-1464
Book Online

CONTACT US
Rob Robertson – General Manager
(941) 739-7417
[email protected]
Mark Metzler – Assistant Clubhouse Manager
Mark grew up in the small town of Auburn, Indiana and is the youngest of two boys. At 21 he wanted to see what was out there in the world so he packed up and moved to Florida. He started working in Desoto Square Mall for McDuff’s Electronics part-time at the same time working for World Bazaar. Later on, he worked for a new company that came to Florida called Dollar Tree where he worked for 8 years. At the same time he was approached about coming to work for a local bar. This is where he got the bug to bartend and this career lasted 20 years.
At the age of 40, he decided that he wanted to go back to school and get a degree so he signed up at Keiser College for Computer Graphic Design and got his Associates Degree in that field. Painting and drawing has always been a passion of Mark's so whenever he gets free time to relax this is what he likes to do.
Since coming to work at IMG Academy Golf Club, he has enjoyed the challenges of learning a whole new field of work. He is going on celebrating 13 years here at the club which he has had the privilege of getting to know many of the wonderful members at the club. All of his family slowly has moved to Florida over the years so now he gets to enjoy having them here instead of flying north to see them.
(941) 739-7413
[email protected]
Sladjana Lazarevic – Controller
Sladjana has 33 years of Accounting and Finance experience. In 2005, Sladjana joined IMG Academies Golf & Country Club as the Controller overseeing finance and accounting for the Club. Prior to her position at IMG Academies Golf & Country Club, she worked for Chevron Texaco where she gained invaluable experience that has enabled her to establish proper procedures and control to implement at the Club. Further her hands-on experience has provided solid direction for the Club and team.
In 2004, Sladjana earned her designation of a Certified Public Accountant and holds a bachelor’s degree in both Accounting and Finance.
In her spare time, you can find her enjoying the beach and going on long walks with her dog. Sladjana enjoys spending time with her husband and daughter, a IMG Academies Alumni and former D1 tennis player.
(941) 739-7415
[email protected]
Sydney Weber - Membership & Administrative Coordinator
Sydney is a native to the area as she was born and raised in Bradenton. She attended Manatee High School and obtained her Associate's degree from State College of Florida. She has been with the Golf Club since March of 2022 and enjoys all of the connections she continues to make here.
In her time away from work she enjoys spending time with her dogs, attending concerts, trying new foods and restaurants, and reading.
(941) 739-7439
[email protected]
Rocky Fidelibus - Executive Chef
(941) 739-7421
Debbie Arrigall-Watkins - Banquet & Event Manager
(941) 739-7414
[email protected]
Debra joined IMG Academy Golf Club in October 2023
bringing with her years of experience in planning Weddings,
Banquets & Events. Originally from Wales, UK, Debra
emigrated to Florida with her husband and children over
20 years ago, apart from a brief return home to Wales,
Debra has settled here in Sarasota, near her children and
grandchildren. Having worked on both sides of the pond,
Debra brings both cultures together, giving you the best
of both worlds. Debra has been self-employed most of
her working life, she looks on every opportunity as if it is
her own. You are guaranteed to be given 110% when you
work alongside Debra on your special occasion.
"I look forward to working with you and making your
Event memorable"
Sadie Guffey - Assistant Event Manager
(941) 739-7419
[email protected]
Steve Strausbaugh – Director of Golf
Steve was born and raised in Venice, FL, where he grew up playing baseball and golf. Baseball became his main sport the first year of high school where played 3 years of Varsity. He played Division 1 baseball at Western Carolina University and studied biology. The New York Yankees organization drafted him in 2007, and Steve played professionally for 3 years before a shoulder injury forced an early retirement.
After a father son trip to Ireland, he returned to golf with a renewed passion for the game. Steve attended and graduated from Professional Golfers Career College with an associate’s degree in Golf Course Management. At The Golf College, he fell in love with instructing, growing the game of golf, as well as tournament operations. Steve has been at IMG for 12 years working from PGA associate to now a Member of PGA of America.
Steve’s full swing Teaching Philosophy gets students envisioning the golf swing as an athletic movement executed by their natural ability. He believes everyone’s swing is unique, and there is more than one way to swing a golf club successfully. His goal is to unite his student’s unique characteristics with simple fundamentals, thus creating a sound, effortless, repeatable golf swing. Steve’s short game philosophy creates standard short game swing using full swing techniques. By making small simple adjustments at setup, you can create a variety of shots only limited by the golfer’s imagination. Steve’s putting philosophy simplifies the mechanics of putting into two major strokes. Matching the setup and the stroke makes putting easier and fun to practice.
[email protected]
Jason Uibel – Assistant Golf Professional
Growing up in South Jersey, Jason grew up as an all-around athlete playing Ice hockey, Baseball, Golf, Lacrosse, and Snowboarding. After an ACL tear in 2018 Jason turned his attention to golf and working in the golf industry. Jason attended Keiser University’s College of Golf and Graduated in May of 2021. While at Keiser Jason was a part of Keiser’s Men’s Lacrosse team and Club Golf team.
After graduating, Jason headed to Telluride Colorado to work at Telluride Golf and Ski Club. There he worked under teaching pro Mike Dero who helped him with continuing his learning of teaching fundamentals. After a summer in the mountains, he came back to Florida, where he would spend the next 3 winter seasons working at some of the top private golf clubs in Palm Beach County, while spending the summer months at clubs up north in the Greater Philadelphia area.  The last few years Jason has made starts on the Minor League Golf Tour and captured his first ever 1st Place finish this past summer. He also competed in the US Open Local qualifying this past May and looks to try and compete again this upcoming year.
Jason’s teaching philosophies focus on course management, swing mechanics as well as maintaining a healthy body to increase longevity.  Good course Management plays a key role in lowering golf scores as knowing how to play holes and where to place shots is key. And with a passion for fitness, Jason likes to focus on maintaining strength and mobility as both are essential to hitting the ball straighter and longer, as well as playing pain free golf. Jason is looking forward to working with all the members here at IMG Academy Golf Club and helping make the world a better place one swing at a time.
[email protected]
Renze Berg – Golf Course Superintendent
Renze Berg has been here at IMG Golf Club since February 21st, 2022.  Prior to accepting this position, he was Golf Course Superintendent at River Strand Golf and Country Club from October 2015-February 2022.  Before that, he was Golf Course Superintendent at Bradenton Country Club from May 1998-Oct 2015.  Renze Graduated from Lake City Community College in 1996 with an A.S. Degree in Golf Course Management.
Renze was born and raised here in Bradenton and Graduated High School from Bradenton Christian School in 1990.  He enjoys hunting, fishing and golf.
[email protected]
Jay Mullen – IMG Academy Director of Grounds
Jay Mullen is the new Director of Grounds for the Academy, and he will also be working closely with Superintendent, Keith Welter, on the golf course.  He started working in the turfgrass industry shortly after moving to Florida from St. Louis, Missouri 20+ years ago.  11 of those years have been spent as Director of Grounds at multi-course facilities including Black Diamond, Palm Aire Country Club, and most recently Plantation Golf and Country Club in Venice.  His turf management degree was earned with a combination of credits from the University of Missouri and Penn State University.
Jay has a short commute from north Sarasota where he lives with my wife, Angie, and three children Sydney, Zoey, and Andrew.  He enjoys cheering for his daughters’ volleyball teams and chasing his 2yo around the house when he is not at work.  He is excited to be part of the IMG Academy team and is looking forward to a productive tenure.
[email protected]

Member Login Instructions
All first time users will need to register in order to access the members only area. To do so, click on the Member Registration link below and enter your Member Number, First Name and Last Name as they appear on your account statement.
Once you have registered and validated your account you will be asked to create your own User Name and Password. You will only be asked to do this once.
